summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1471 m), light levels (up 8711 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 2.7m higher than yesterday, 853.5m lower than the past week, 1471.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1268.3m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. Showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
